resources.string:
Rank Tiers: 
 Silver - Very Easy
 Gold - Easy
 Amethyst - Advanced
 Ruby - Hard
 Emerald - Very Hard
 Diamond - Extremely Hard
 
 Every league has 5 division reaching from 1 to 5, where 1 is the highest and 5 the lowest. 
 Gain LP (league points): 
 Complete enough routes according to your rank in one session. 
 Loose LP: 
 Not able to complete enough routes according to your rank in one session. 
 Ranking up in divisions: 
 Reach 100 LP and rank up automatically in to the next higher division. 
 Fall in divisions: 
 Reach 0 LP and fall automatically in to the next lower division. 
 Promotion: 
 Reach 100 LP at the highest division and complete 3 routes of the next rank tier within the next 3 sessions. 
 Demotion: 
 Reach 0 LP at the lowest division and if you fail to complete 3 routes of your current rank tier within the next 2 sessions.
